title: Scheduled Station for HL7 Order
description: Scheduled Station selected on MWL HL7 Order Feed

cn.title: Name
cn.description: Arbitrary/Meaningful name for the Scheduled Station Order Mapping

hl7OrderScheduledStationDeviceName.title: Scheduled Station Device Name
hl7OrderScheduledStationDeviceName.description: Device name of Scheduled Station used for HL7 Order Messages.

dcmProperty.title: Conditions
dcmProperty.description: Conditions in format {SEG}-{Seq#}[.{Comp#}[.{SubComp#}]][!]={regEx}. Examples: MSH-4=FORWARD or MSH-9=ADT\^A28\^ADT_A05
